turns.text: Do you want to tell me about your budgeting plan
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Yeah our budgeting plan includes me getting job Were were at the point now I go- I quit working about six months ago to start this house --
turns.label: ny

turns.text: -- and Im out of cash and Im not out of project yet
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So uh Im going to go back and do some consulting work As far as budgets concerned Im Im fairly fortunate Uh weve were right now where if we dont buy anything extra we can make it on what my wife makes So you know the projects kind of halted until then But as far as budgeting is concerned you know we have uh some pretty strict guidelines that we go for you know we always put ten percent back and thats never touch
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Either savings or investment one of the two but we dont ever put it in high risk Its just always going to be there
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And as far as the rest of its concerned we dont have any kind of uh what I would call extravagant expenses you know we uh we pretty much live on about eight nine hundred month you know just travel to and from work and clothing and food --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- and the rest of it you know we pile into the house And uh you know Im fairly fortunate I mean our credit cards are out to the max right now because Im --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- little behind on that but uh were still making the payments on them Its just when you - see in Texas you cannot borrow the money to build your own home --
-- its its tough here too You have to have the contractor sign with you
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But its easy to find contractor for couple of hundred bucks wholl sign it and let you do it --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And where I live it its pretty scary because Texas is one of those strange states where if you have contractor sign on your note like that --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and you screw up you dont get it finished the bank can eat the contractor
Yeah bad for him But the homeowner cant be touched
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Yeah see right now if I quit paying any of my bills the only thing they could do is cut off electricity They cant take your land unless you dont pay your land taxes Period
turns.label: ny

turns.text: You know They can take your car and your clothes and your anything thats not the tools of your trade but as far as uh you know youre pretty much bullet proof in this state
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I just finished James Micheners TEXAS book
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well you know were were not ones to budget much you know We just going to spend it all
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Thats kind of what we do We uh were and so we pay ten percent --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and then you know we put I guess its like fifteen to twenty percent into savings account
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But that sometimes we use for emergency type things
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But uh and my wife doesnt work Were fortunate that way that I make enough to do what we want to do
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah yeah were pretty pretty fortunate as far as the uh the budgeting is concerned because you know we dont have any long term debt You know uh we paid cash for car Well we bought the car on time one of them but we you know we since paid it off
turns.label: b

turns.text: The land is paid for cash so we dont have to worry about that
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Thats great position to be in
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Well its fraught with other problems
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh What kind of consulting do you do
turns.label: b

turns.text: Uh systems consulting Computerization for construction firms
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah Im just brushing up on well plus plus
turns.label: ny

turns.text: I just got that few days ago
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh gees dont get me to lying I bought it at fire sale
turns.label: fe

turns.text: This guys place burned down and he had bunch of computer stuff and you know I bought it all It was two hundred bucks for everything he had
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well some of it wasnt worth anything you know
turns.label: sd

turns.text: You know lot of the uh diskettes were just totally unusable
turns.label: sd

turns.text: But I did get out of there with uh Vermont Views which is huge -
turns.label: sd
